Text.val: -- Author: Asaf Kehati
26.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
15.11.2012 AS SCR#17691 fixed form output with expressions where attribute was ANSI instead of Unicode
26.07.2011 SH SCR16635 Extended T432_INVOICENO to alpha 20
15.04.2011 GB SCR16371 Eliminate GNRL_LANGUAGE
13.04.2011 GB SCR16261 Replaced the GB002 by the GB902
12.11.2008 GB SCR14099 Remove LinkQuery DEBB (Info: no variables are selected)
15.10.2007 AK SCR12801 change in translation
10.09.2007 AK SCR12801 report printed in CLNT language + translation problem
24.07.2007 GB SCR11591 BXA432 - Debtor changes confidential clients/Added at end
task "Delete all T432" then delete all T432 rows where T432_NO = PI.T432_NO
13.07.2007 SH SCR12638 Changed filename for final XML file
10.07.2007 SH SCR12639 Changed layout of report and printed same
invoices new/old on same line in case of partial payments
10.05.2006 AK SCR11216 removed test flag to enable delete of MULT rows
12.04.2006 AS SCR#10927 fixed open modes for table CLNT
REPA - REPORT_ARCHIVE is already produce by BCM432.
geting the REPA_JORNALNO
-- Uses to switch system language to general language (=report language) and
back to user language if report is created
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- needed for errorhandling
-- Get user language, uses to switch back to user language if report was produce
online
-- report has to be printed in CLNT_LANGUAGE
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Directory for templates
-- Directory for temporary XML Files
-- Get values from GENERAL
-- Build FileNames for Templates
BLOBK1 if no data found in temp table T432
BLOBK1 ELSE
-- 1. STEP --> Check for existing Template (s)
-- 2. STEP --> Check for existing TempDirectory
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- Switch system language to GNRL_LANGUAGE, in which report has to be produced
-- Start creation of XML report
-- Switch system language back to user language
-- Delete all T432
END BLOBK1

ExpSyntax.val: 'N O D A T A I S F O U N D I N T E M P T A B L E T 4 3 2 W I T H T432_NO='&Trim ({0,1})

-- sub headers and Columntitels

-- Build filename for temporary XML Files
-- Build final filename for the XML File
-- Build static text fields
-- Reportheader
-- sub headers and Columntitels
There is no need to Store REPORT- ARCHIVE (already done in BCM431)
Write XML header
BXA450A Heading lines
BXA503B Print lines on the report
-- Produce final XML-File
-- Copy final XML File to tamino queue
-- Copy of final XML File failed
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523 (34)

SQL_STMT_U.val: delete from :1/MULT as MULT where substr (MULT.MULT_KEY_CODE,1,:3)=':2'

Text.val: CTRL+H for extra SQL where
sum new invoces to client currency
sum old invoces to client currency
-- First partial paid invoices have to be printed (new/paid invoices on the same
line)
-- Print fully paid invoices
... new invoices on left site
... paid incoices on right site
init amounts for next debtor

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT MULT.MULT_KEY_CODE, MULT.MULT_KEY_NUMBER, MULT.MULT_NUMERIC1, MULT.MULT_NUMERIC2, MULT.MULT_NUMERIC6 FROM :1/MULT AS MULT WHERE MULT.MULT_KEY_CODE=':2' and MULT.MULT_KEY_NUMBER :3 and MULT_NUMERIC6 :4

Text.val: -- Write one blank line after printing partial payments
